full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SLOB DPON PADMA SAMBHA WA LA BRTEN PA'I TSE SGRUB BYA TSUL MI 'GYUR SROG GI KVA BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS, , `DPAL CHEN RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG KHROS PA YAB YUM GYI BSGOM BZLAS NYAMS SU LEN TSUL GNAD DON SNYING PO DANG, DE'I BKA' SDOD GTER BSRUNG BCAS KYI MCHOD THABS 'KHYER BDE BZHUGS SO, , `RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI SGRUB THABS DREGS PA KUN 'DUL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,(CES RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI SGRUB THABS TSIGS NYUNG LA DON CHA TSANG TSIGS BCAD DU BSDEBS PA 'DI 'DRA ZHIG DGOS ZHES DKON MCHOG BLA MAR 'DZIN CING DANG PA DANG GTONG BA LA SOGS PA DAM PAS SNGAGS PA'I YON TAN DANG LDAN PA DUR BED WANG PHUN TSOGS BSAM GRUB KYI DPON MO NOR BU R'A GAS NAN GYIS BSKUL NGOR, KU S'A LI, ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS AOR DU SU WANG GI HO RO'I SGAR THOG TU THUN GCIG LA MGYOGS PAR SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
